Text: hii thankz for this gr8 upload can u tell how to add album art su that they can appear when i play them from .cue file track by track ,,i have some cue files but when i play the total 2hours file then album art showed up but when i play the same file with .cue then album art is not working...so plzz help how to make this thing work....

Hi Runtw01
You add album art to MP3 files and applies only to the mp3. If I understood the question, it should be the answer.
